The iOS 9 and 10 compatible successor ofis here!

Bring your app switcher to the world of 3D with 3D Switcher! You'll never want to go back to 2D again.

Features:

7 Modes -
1. 3D Cards
2. Card Deck
3. CoverFlow
4. Inverse CoverFlow
5. Subtler Cover Flow
6. Inverse Subtler Cover Flow
7. 2D Cards (for those who really want the iOS 7 or 8 style switcher)

Icon Animations:
1. Fade Icons in the Switcher when panning
2. Scale Icons in the Switcher when panning
3. Roll Icons in the Switcher when panning
Configure options from Settings app.

Demo Video:

1. Performance Optimizations 2. Fix intermittent crash when closing apps 1. Fix a regression with 2.0.3 that would cause a memory leak while closing apps (occasionally leading to crashes while closing apps)

1. Fix crash due to the "Quit all apps" dialog not dismissing when the switcher was dismissed


1. Fix bug with re-opening initial app after the app was closed in the switcher
2. Close Animation is now smoother
3. Cards no longer "snap" to center, and instead now scroll smoothly to center
4. Cards no longer become off-center when scrolling smoothly. They now smoothly scroll until a card is centered.
